title: What Is This Chunky Sans?

author: Colin Trechter

comments.content: Any Guess? My apologies for this stunted post and poor image.

Also available in a slightly different digitization from [Scangraphic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050035/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/scangraphic/compacta_sh_black/?sample_text=FASHION%20PHOTOGRAPHY&sample_size=28)
